about_the_game:
Join the ultimate banana frenzy with Banana Clicker! In this addictive idle game, you'll become the ultimate banana collector, using your skills to gather as many bananas as possible. From the humble beginnings of clicking on a single banana, you'll progress to purchasing banana farms, employing apes, and even obtaining exotic gear to customize your banana!

With easy-to-learn gameplay and a range of exciting upgrades, Banana Clicker is the perfect game for anyone who loves to relax and unwind with a bit of casual gaming. Keep clicking and watch your banana empire grow - who knows how far you'll go?

New - Drawing Bananas!!


Unlock various color palettes and draw your own banana designs, submit them to the shareboard in-game and get your design up to the top for seasonal rewards, and even adding your design to the game! May the best banana win.

Features

Obtain randomly rolled gear from the Shady Dealer and kit our banana with a variety of buffs and unique effects.

Crates and balloons will spawn randomly and reward active play! Click on them for a surge of bananas

Purchase both idle and active upgrades that'll help you scratch that banana itch.

COMING SOON

  • Zones
  • Gear Sets
  • More Achievements

name: Banana Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Collect bananas, hire workers, and gear up your banana in Banana Clicker, the ultimate idle game. Can you become the best banana collector?
